title: Blade’s funding crisis denies poor students a better future (DA - Democratic Alliance)
text: ( Source : DA - Democratic Alliance ) The University of Fort Hare ( UFH ) wants to increase registration fees next year from R3500 to R5000 and increase tuition fees by 15% on top of the 15% increase at the end of last year. These proposed
